intro: Keetia purpurascens, commonly known as the purple-flowered keetia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to deep purple. Its leaves are typically ovate and have a smooth texture. Keetia purpurascens is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forests and stream banks.
